name: Lost in the Workshop
description:
A boy's soul was trapped in the body of a toy, he must explore through a cursed workshop. In an adventure full of obstacles, friendly and also hostile toys, the boy picks up tools that he can carry from one place to another, jumping, moving platforms and exploring the different mysteries hidden in the workshop. Help the boy solve the puzzles that arise, learn the story behind the workshop and cancel the curse that keeps him imprisoned.

Controls:

WASD = Move

Mouse = Move Camera

SPACE = Jump

F = Grab Objects
